comments.html: Is a multi-vendor EVPN a good idea? I keep hearing EVPN is a standard but yet every vendor when applying into their implementation use different features!
comments.name: Away

comments.html:
When I was a consultant I was making a good living using your principles. :-) Just configure back everything to the vendor reference design, since that was the best tested configuration. :-) That is so true...
I always had an explanation. In California, you want to deliver quick and dirty, since the girls are waiting for you at the beach... :-) So testing is limited to the very minimum... Never forget this... :-) :-) :-)
comments.name: Bela
